thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Simon Green

author: Simon Green
title: Simon Green
text:
Ran out of aerosol paint while re-painting the roof of my Alfa Romeo GTV. Had resigned myself to having to finish it on my next days off, as I was due to return to work in two days time.
However, I ordered a can of Holts exact match aerosol from Mick's Garage on-line at 5pm and was amazed to receive an e-mail the next day at 7am telling me the item was already at my local Royal Mail sorting office. It was delivered at 10am, so I was able to finish the job that day after all.
Excellent service and amazingly quick delivery. Highly recommended.
